list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a machine for shaping wood, metal, or other material by means of a rotating drive which turns the piece being worked on against changeable cutting tools.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I have lathed metal in a machine shop
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã có kim loại máy tiện trong một cửa hàng máy
